author: Wzyss
install_msg: Thank you for installing AutoVC! Use `[p]help autovc` to see available commands.
name: AutoVC
short: Automatically create voice channels when members join source VCs.
description: Automatically creates voice channels when members join configured source voice channels. Supports three types: Public (anyone can join), Personal (owner-controlled, visible), and Private (owner-controlled, hidden). Features automatic cleanup, owner claiming, and temporary roles for channel management.
